calculationQuestions.question: You have 1000€, you invest them with an interest of 0.7%. How much money do you have after 20 years?
You have 2000€, you invest them with an interest of 0.3%. How much money do you have after 10 years?
You have 6000€, you invest them with an interest of 0.5%. How much money do you have after 5 years?
You have 5000€, you invest them with an interest of 0.8%. How much money do you have after 27 years?
